Question
========

Gegeven is de volgende frequentietabel:

klassegrenzen klassemidden frequenties
[14,16> 15 4
[16,18> 17 6
[18,20> 19 8
[20,22> 21 3
[22,24> 23 9
[24,26> 25 1
[26,28> 27 10

In welke klasse valt de mediaan? 

Answerlist
----------
* [18,20>
* [20,22>
* [22,24>
* [26,28>

Solution
========

The correct answer is  [20,22>
